Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sigh_00>To join us is to become part of a collective
shrouded in secrecy, our lives sworn to
Master Kohga.
Who you were before matters not. <sp:5:0:0>Only
your strength, your loyalty,<sp:5:0:0> and your skill
for espionage.
Find our <clr:0000>three branches<clr:ffff>, and collect the
<clr:0000>clan attire<clr:ffff>. Earn your place among us and
the door will open to you.
<snd:TalkPositive_01>Maybe THEN we'll teach you our moves.


<sp:0:2:2:7d00>Now go away.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Huh? G-go away? I don't get a hint about
where the <clr:0000>branches <clr:ffff>are<sp:5:0:0> or even a peek at
what the Yiga Clan <clr:0000>wears<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>Hey, come on. You've got to be kidding...


My mom said, "I know my sweet little
Mimos will pass the Yiga test first try!"
That's why I came all the way out here...
But not only did I not pass, I didn't even
get past the front gate...
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>What, you wanna join the Yiga Clan too?


I've got some bad newsâ€”they won't let
you in unless you get your own <clr:0000>Yiga
outfit<clr:ffff> from these <clr:0000>three branch <clr:ffff>places.
Boy, what a dangerous, life-threatening
ordeal that must be! You should probably
just give up now, I'd say.
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Ease_01>I better try to scare him off... Keep the competition
slim. Not that I have any idea where to start.

I guess there was a rumor the Yiga Clan took over
the what's-its-name lab way up northeast in Akkala...
Maybe that's something.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_0005:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>But...if I do join the Yiga Clan, then I'll be able to
learn some <clr:0000>cool moves<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0701>If I could bust 'em out, I bet everybody'd be like,
"Wow, Mimos, you're so handsome and cool." <sp:5:1:0>Hm?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Chat_01>Hey, um, so... I heard that I could learn
this really <clr:0000>cool move <clr:ffff>here. I think it's
called the "<clr:0000>Earthwake technique<clr:ffff>"?
Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>Wh-whoa! A real live Yiga!<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Awesome! I've never seen one in person
before! So that's the Yiga outfit, huh?
Looks even more stylish than I thought!
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>OK, that settles it! I'm finding those branches and
getting those duds! Then those cool Yiga moves will
be all mine!
Oh man, I'm gonna be SOOO popular!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkDeny_01>Get lost. <sp:5:1:0>Only Yiga Clan members may
enter this place.
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>And I want to join you! I heard you guys
could teach me some <clr:0000>cool moves<clr:ffff> that'd
have everyone swooning over me!
